Class ImagePanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  ImagePanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class ImagePanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel

This class creates an image panel and handles all of the graphics stuff

Author:
Erik Miller, Jay Sathe, Tristan Seroff, Christian Ciabatoni
